item.title: Get Started
item.description: Buying Adams can be done using Tinyman. You need some Algorand (ALGO) in order to make the trade for Adams. Below you’ll find the steps necessary to trade Adams. First, you’ll need an ALGO wallet. You can download the Pera Wallet from the Android or iOS app store. You can follow the step by step tutorial on how to setup a wallet here. Once you have a wallet, you’ll need to purchase some ALGO.
